TypeSignature.Value: public abstract class BaseValidator : System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label, System.Web.UI.IValidator
.class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit BaseValidator extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label implements class System.Web.UI.IValidator
Public MustInherit Class BaseValidator Inherits Label Implements IValidator
public ref class BaseValidator abstract : System::Web::UI::WebControls::Label, System::Web::UI::IValidator
type BaseValidator = class inherit Label interface IValidator

summary.span: Serves as the abstract base class for validation controls.

span.span: Serves as the abstract base class for validation controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供了所有验证控件的核心实现。The class provides the core implementation for all validation controls. 验证控件用于验证关联的输入控件中的用户输入。Validation controls are used to validate user input in an associated input control. 当用户输入的值未通过验证时，验证控件将显示一条错误消息。When the user enters a value that fails validation, the validation control displays an error message. 因为验证控件分开的输入控件，可以在相对于输入控件的页面上任意位置放置错误消息。Because a validation control is separated from the input control, you can position the error message anywhere on the page relative to the input control. ASP.NET 提供了多个执行特定类型的验证的验证控件。ASP.NET provides several validation controls that perform specific types of validation. 下表描述了这些控件。The following table describes these controls. |验证控件Validation control|描述Description| |------------------------|-----------------| ||通过设置验证针对另一个输入控件中输入的值，与常量值，或对正确数据类型的值属性设置为。Validates a value against the value entered into another input control, against a constant value, or against a proper data type by setting the property to .| ||验证使用用户提供自定义验证例程的值。Validates a value using a user-provided custom validation routine.| ||验证某个值是否为值的范围内。Validates whether a value is within a range of values.| ||验证使用正则表达式的值。Validates a value using a regular expression.| ||验证在必填字段中输入一个值。Validates that a value was entered in a required field.| 验证控件始终验证服务器上关联的输入的控件。Validation controls always validate the associated input control on the server. 验证控件还具有完整客户端实现，它允许启用脚本的浏览器 （如 Microsoft Internet Explorer 4.0 及更高版本) 客户端上执行验证。Validation controls also have complete client-side implementation that allows script-enabled browsers (such as Microsoft Internet Explorer version 4.0 and later) to perform validation on the client. 客户端验证发送到服务器之前检查用户输入，从而增强了验证过程。Client-side validation enhances the validation process by checking user input before it is sent to the server. 这样前提交表单时，避免服务器端验证所需信息在往返行程在客户端上检测到错误。This allows errors to be detected on the client before the form is submitted, avoiding the round trip of information necessary for server-side validation. 多个验证控件可以与单独的输入控件，用于验证不同的条件。Multiple validation controls can be used with an individual input control to validate different criteria. 例如，可以应用多个验证控件上控件。For example, you can apply multiple validation controls on a control. 可以使用控件，以确保中输入的值控件是在组范围内，和一个控制以确保用户输入的值。You can use a control to ensure that the value entered in the control is within a set range, and a control to ensure that the user enters a value. ASP.NET 提供了许多控件具有回发到服务器的功能。ASP.NET provides many controls that have the ability to post back to the server. 当其中一个控件具有其`CausesValidation`属性设置为`true`，该控件回发到服务器时执行验证。When one of these controls has its `CausesValidation` property set to `true`, validation is performed when the control posts back to the server. 以下控件具有回发到服务器的功能：The following controls have the ability to post back to the server: - - - - - - - - - - - - - > [!NOTE] > 其中一些控件回发到服务器时，才`AutoPostBack`属性设置为`true`。Some of these controls post back to the server only when the `AutoPostBack` property is set to `true`. 每个这些控件具有`ValidationGroup`属性，设置时，该控件触发回发到服务器时，验证仅指定组中的验证控件。These controls each have a `ValidationGroup` property that, when set, validates only the validation controls within the specified group when the control triggers a post back to the server. 要验证对控件进行分组，请将为相同的值每个验证控件的属性。To group validation controls, set the property of each validation control to the same value. 若要将与验证控件关联的输入的控件，请使用属性。To associate an input control with a validation control, use the property. 若要指定要验证失败时验证控件中显示的文本，请使用属性。To specify the text to display in a validation control when validation fails, use the property. 此外可以显示的所有控件都使用失败的页中的验证摘要控件。You can also display a summary of all controls that fail validation in the page by using a control. 若要指定要在中显示的文本控制，请使用属性。To specify the text to display in a control, use the property. > [!NOTE] > 如果您设置属性但没有设置属性、 的值属性还会显示在验证控件。If you set the property without setting the property, the value of the property is also displayed in the validation control. 使用验证程序控件时，应始终检查在执行任何处理之前的服务器端验证的结果。When using validator controls, you should always check the results of server-side validation before performing any processing. 回发，但之后调用事件方法之前，请在页调用验证程序控件和聚合到其结果属性。After a postback but before your event methods are called, the page calls the validator controls and aggregates their results into the property. (您还可以调用使用显式的验证程序控件`Validate`方法。)在你自己的代码，应检查属性返回`true`之前处理输入。(You can also call the validator controls explicitly using the `Validate` method.) In your own code, you should check that the property returns `true` before processing input. 即使启用脚本的浏览器可能会阻止在回发发生在客户端上，如果验证检查失败，始终还应检查之前，在服务器代码处理经验证的数据。Even though script-enabled browsers might prevent a postback from occurring on the client if a validation check has failed, you should always also check in server code before processing validated data. 您可以手动执行验证。You can also manually perform validation. 若要验证所有验证控件的页上，使用方法。To validate all validation controls on the page, use the method. 可以通过使用验证各自的验证控件控件的方法。Individual validation controls can be validated by using the method of the control. > [!NOTE] > 如果您使用中的属性`Page_Load`方法，您必须首先显式调用方法。If you use the property in a `Page_Load` method, you must first explicitly call the method. 因为验证后发生事件的页上，但在之前的事件处理程序`Click`或`Command`事件，属性不更新直到调用方法。Because validation occurs after the event for the page, but before the event handler for the `Click` or `Command` events, the property is not updated until the method is called. 或者，可以在事件处理程序放置你的代码`Click`或`Command`而不是事件`Page_Load`方法。As an alternative, you can place your code in the event handler for the `Click` or `Command` event instead of the `Page_Load` method. 不是所有 Web 服务器控件都支持验证的控件。Not all Web server controls support validation controls. 与验证控件进行验证的标准控件包括：The standard controls that can be validated with a validation control are: - - - - - - - - - - > [!NOTE] > 要验证的输入控件的属性必须应用于控件。For an input control to be validated, the attribute must be applied to the control. > [!NOTE] > 当使用验证程序控件派生自内控制，请确保验证程序控件与之关联的控件相同的面板。When you use validator controls that derive from inside an control, make sure that the validator control and the control it is associated with are in the same panel. 有关使用详细信息控制部分页面更新，请参阅[局部页面呈现概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5c12736d-d9e9-464a-9388-3fe0f9f49e49)。For more information about using the control for partial-page updates, see [Partial-Page Rendering Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5c12736d-d9e9-464a-9388-3fe0f9f49e49). 验证失败时，您可以将焦点设置在关联的输入控件上设置属性设置为`true`。When validation fails, you can set the focus on the associated input control by setting the property to `true`. 有关实例的初始属性值的列表，请参阅构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. ## 可访问性Accessibility 有关如何配置此控件，以便它将生成符合辅助功能标准标记的信息，请参阅[Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的辅助功能](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)和[ASP.NET 控件和可访问性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用多个验证控件验证用户输入中的有效值控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use multiple validation controls to verify that the user enters a valid value in a control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic BaseValidator Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic BaseValidator Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic BaseValidator Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic BaseValidator Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不直接调用此构造函数。This constructor is not called directly. 从此类继承的验证控件可以从他们自己的构造函数以初始化基属性调用此构造函数。Validation controls that inherit from this class can call this constructor from their own constructors to initialize the base properties. 下表显示的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of . |属性Property|初始值Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`true`| ||| ||`true`| ||`false`|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用来呈现该控件的 HTML 标记中的控件的属性。The method is used to render the attributes of the control in the HTML tag for the control. 此方法通常重写由控件开发人员在派生类中，若要将适当的特性和样式控件的输出流。This method is typically overridden by control developers in derived classes to insert the appropriate attributes and styles to the output stream for a control.

span.para: 重写时方法，请务必调用基类中的相应方法。否则，将不呈现在基类中包含的属性。
When overriding the method, be sure to call the corresponding method in the base class. Otherwise, the attributes contained in the base class will not be rendered.

summary.span: Verifies whether the specified control is on the page and contains validation properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是帮助程序方法主要由方法以验证是否指定的控件的页上，并包含验证属性。The method is a helper method used primarily by the method to verify whether the specified control is on the page and contains validation properties. 此方法不返回一个值，以报告结果。This method does not return a value to report the result. 相反，当验证失败时引发异常。Instead, it throws an exception when verification fails. > [!NOTE] > 此方法主要由控件开发人员使用。This method is used primarily by control developers.

exception.span: The specified control is not found.

span.span: The specified control is not found.

exception.span: \- or - The specified control does not have a attribute associated with it; therefore, it cannot be validated with a validation control.

span.span: \- or - The specified control does not have a attribute associated with it; therefore, it cannot be validated with a validation control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是帮助程序方法主要由属性来确定是否属性包含有效的输入的控件。The method is a helper method used primarily by the property to determine whether the property contains a valid input control. 若要成为有效的输入的控件，属性必须设置为某个值，该值必须是支持验证页上的控件。To be a valid input control, the property must be set to some value and that value must be a control on the page that supports validation. > [!NOTE] > 此方法主要由控件开发人员使用。This method is used primarily by control developers.

exception.span: \- or - The input control specified by the property does not have a attribute associated with it; therefore, it cannot be validated with a validation control.

span.span: \- or - The input control specified by the property does not have a attribute associated with it; therefore, it cannot be validated with a validation control.

summary.span: Gets or sets the input control to validate.

span.span: Gets or sets the input control to validate.

value.span: 要验证的输入的控件。

span.span: The input control to validate.

value.span: 默认值是，指示未设置此属性。

span.span: The default value is , which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来指定要验证的输入的控件。Use the property to specify the input control to validate. 此属性必须设置为除之外的所有验证控件的输入控件的 ID控件，可以为空。This property must be set to the ID of an input control for all validation controls except the control, which can be left blank. 如果未指定有效的输入的控件，在呈现页面时，将引发异常。If you do not specify a valid input control, an exception will be thrown when the page is rendered. ID 必须引用与验证控件相同的容器内的控件。The ID must refer to a control within the same container as the validation control. 它必须在同一页面或用户控件或它必须是模板化控件在同一模板中。It must be in the same page or user control, or it must be in the same template of a templated control. 要验证的标准控件包括：The standard controls that can be validated are: - - - - - - - - - - > [!NOTE] > 要验证的输入控件的属性必须应用于控件。For an input control to be validated, the attribute must be applied to the control. 所有验证控件，除非控件，将通过验证，如果指定的输入的控件属性不包含任何文本。All validation controls, except the control, will pass validation if the input control specified by the property contains no text. 如果使用的控件、 客户端和服务器端验证函数不会调用。If you are using a control, the client-side and server-side validation functions are not called either. 主题或样式表主题不能设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[ASP.NET 主题和外观](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来指定要验证的输入的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the input control to validate. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic BaseValidator Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic BaseValidator Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic BaseValidator Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic BaseValidator Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是主要由一个帮助器函数属性来确定客户端的浏览器是否支持客户端脚本。The method is a helper function that is used primarily by the property to determine whether the client's browser supports client script. 为此属性以返回`true`，必须满足以下条件：For this property to return `true`, the following conditions must be true: - 在浏览器已启用的客户端脚本。The browser has client script enabled. - 的属性对象存储在属性为 1 或更高版本。The property of the object that is stored in the property is 1 or later. - 的属性对象存储在属性为 1.2 或更高版本。The property of the object that is stored in the property is 1.2 or later. > [!NOTE] > 此方法主要由控件开发人员使用。This method is used primarily by control developers.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidatorDisplay Display { get; set; }
.property instance valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidatorDisplay Display
Public Property Display As ValidatorDisplay
public: property System::Web::UI::WebControls::ValidatorDisplay Display { System::Web::UI::WebControls::ValidatorDisplay get(); void set(System::Web::UI::WebControls::ValidatorDisplay value); };
member this.Display : System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidatorDisplay with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets the display behavior of the error message in a validation control.

span.span: Gets or sets the display behavior of the error message in a validation control.

value.span: 值之一。

span.span: One of the values.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来指定验证控件中的错误消息的显示行为。Use the property to specify the display behavior of the error message in the validation control. 下表列出了可用的不同值。The following table lists the different values that can be used. |显示行为Display behavior|描述Description| |----------------------|-----------------| |`None`|验证消息永远不会内联显示。The validation message is never displayed inline.| |`Static`|用于验证消息的空间分配的页面布局中。Space for the validation message is allocated in the page layout.| |`Dynamic`|如果验证失败，用于验证消息的空间是动态添加到页面。Space for the validation message is dynamically added to the page if validation fails.| > [!NOTE] > 显示行为取决于是否使用了客户端验证。The display behavior depends on whether client-side validation is performed. 如果客户端验证未处于活动状态 (因为浏览器不支持它或者因为已禁用通过使用page 指令或属性)，`ValidatorDisplay.Static`和`ValidatorDisplay.Dynamic`的行为方式相同： 错误消息将采用空间才会显示它。If client-side validation is not active (because the browser does not support it or because it has been disabled by using the page directive or property), `ValidatorDisplay.Static` and `ValidatorDisplay.Dynamic` behave the same way: the error message takes up space only if it is displayed. 动态消息分配空间时不显示的功能 (`ValidatorDisplay.Dynamic`) 仅适用于客户端验证。The ability to dynamically allocate space for the message when it is not being displayed (`ValidatorDisplay.Dynamic`) only works with client-side validation. 主题或样式表主题不能设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[ASP.NET 主题和外观](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来验证消息添加到网页上动态验证失败时指定该空间。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify that space for the validation message is added to the Web page dynamically when validation fails. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic BaseValidator Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic BaseValidator Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic BaseValidator Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic BaseValidator Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

exception.span: The specified value is not one of the values.

span.span: The specified value is not one of the values.

summary.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether client-side validation is enabled.

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether client-side validation is enabled.

value.span: 如果启用了客户端验证;否则为。

span.span: if client-side validation is enabled; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定是否启用客户端验证。Use the property to specify whether client-side validation is enabled. 验证控件始终在服务器上执行验证。Validation controls always perform validation on the server. 它们还具有完整客户端实现，它允许 DHTML 支持浏览器 （如 Microsoft Internet Explorer 4.0 及更高版本） 客户端上执行验证。They also have complete client-side implementation that allows DHTML-supported browsers (such as Microsoft Internet Explorer 4.0 and later) to perform validation on the client. 客户端验证发送到服务器之前检查用户输入，从而增强了验证过程。Client-side validation enhances the validation process by checking user input before it is sent to the server. 这样前提交表单时，避免服务器端验证所需信息在往返行程在客户端上检测到错误。This allows errors to be detected on the client before the form is submitted, avoiding the round trip of information necessary for server-side validation. 默认情况下，此值设置为`true`，这使客户端验证，如果浏览器支持它。By default, this value is set to `true`, which enables client-side validation if the browser supports it. 您可以禁用基于控件的控件的客户端验证。You can disable client-side validation on a control-by-control basis. 如果动态更新在客户端上创建的页的布局问题，或如果你想要验证发生之前执行一些服务器代码，这非常有用。This is useful if dynamic updating on the client creates problems with the layout of the page, or if you want to execute some server code before validation takes place. 主题或样式表主题不能设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[ASP.NET 主题和外观](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来禁用客户端验证，以便可以在服务器上生成随机数字。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to disable client-side validation so that the random numbers can be generated on the server. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic BaseValidator Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic BaseValidator Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic BaseValidator Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic BaseValidator Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the validation control is enabled.

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the validation control is enabled.

value.span: 如果启用验证控件;否则为。

span.span: if the validation control is enabled; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定是否启用验证控件。Use the property to specify whether the validation control is enabled. 可以通过将此属性设置为禁用的验证控件`false`。You can disable the validation control by setting this property to `false`. 设置或属性设置为`false`将阻止执行验证。Setting either the or the property to `false` will prevent validation from being performed. 这将导致属性来计算结果始终为`true`。This causes the property to always evaluate to `true`. 属性是略有不同属性。The property is slightly different from the property. 如果验证控件属性设置为`true`，但属性设置为`false`，对于客户端验证，但处于禁用状态，仍将呈现验证控件。If the property for a validation control is set to `true`, but the property is set to `false`, the validation control is still rendered for client-side validation, but in a disabled state. 然后可以重新使用 DHTML 脚本中启用客户端上的验证控件。You can then re-enable the validation control on the client by using DHTML script. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来启用或禁用在网页上使用服务器端代码的验证控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to enable or disable the validation controls on the Web page using server-side code. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic BaseValidator.Enabled Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic BaseValidator.Enabled Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic BaseValidator.Enabled Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic BaseValidator.Enabled Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来启用或禁用在网页上使用客户端代码的验证控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to enable or disable the validation controls on the Web page using client-side code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用时控制，请使用属性来指定要在中显示的文本控制当前的验证控件的验证失败时。When using a control, use the property to specify the text to display in the control when validation fails for the current validation control. 若要指定要在验证控件本身中显示的文本，请使用属性。To specify the text to display in the validation control itself, use the property. > [!NOTE] > 如果您设置属性但没有设置属性、 的值属性还会显示在验证控件。If you set the property without setting the property, the value of the property is also displayed in the validation control. 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到资源文件使用设计器工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[ASP.NET 全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来指定不同的消息控件并和控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify different messages for the control and the and controls. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). summary.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the associated input control passes validation.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来确定关联的输入的控件是否通过验证。Use the property to determine whether the associated input control passes validation. > [!CAUTION] > 由于此属性默认值为`true`，它将返回`true`如果之前执行验证查询此属性。Because the default value of this property is `true`, it will return `true` if you query this property before validation is performed. 例如，这可能是如果你尝试使用此属性在页面的事件。For example, this might occur if you attempt to use this property in the event of a page. 计算属性时，才调用方法。The property is evaluated only when the method is called. 您可以调用为每个验证方法分别控制页上或通过使用在一次调用所有这些方法。You can call the method for each validation control on the page individually, or call all of them at once by using the method. 按钮控件及其`CausesValidation`属性设置为`true`也会调用方法。Button controls with their `CausesValidation` property set to `true` will also call the method. > [!NOTE] > 就可以验证发生之后手动更改此属性的值。It is possible to change the value of this property manually after validation has taken place. 这允许你重写验证结果，如有必要。This allows you to override the validation result, if necessary. 页的属性设置为`true`仅当页上的每个验证控件的属性也设置为`true`。The property for the page is set to `true` only if the property for each validation control on the page is also set to `true`. 主题或样式表主题不能设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[ASP.NET 主题和外观](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来确定关联的输入的控件是否通过验证。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to determine whether the associated input control passes validation. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法调用基控件的后方法，它将设置属性设置为如果满足以下条件：After this method calls the base control's method, it sets the property to if the following conditions are true: - 属性尚未设置。The property is not already set. - 属性指示 ASP.NET 版本早于`4.0`。The property indicates an ASP.NET version earlier than `4.0`. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 4 和更高版本中的验证程序控件并以红色显示错误。By default, validator controls in ASP.NET 4 and later versions do not display errors in red. 有关如何控制验证程序控件的可视外观的信息，请参阅[验证用户输入在 ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461)。For information about how to control the visual appearance of validator controls, see [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461). 此方法还会注册页上的验证控件。This method also registers the validation control on the page.

span.para: 重写时在派生类中，请务必调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托接收事件。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重写此方法，以检查客户端浏览器并配置在呈现之前的兼容性的验证控件。This method has been overridden to check the client browser and configure the validation control for compatibility prior to rendering. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

span.para: 重写时在派生类中，请务必调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托接收事件。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

span.para: 重写时在派生类中，请务必调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托接收事件。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来确定客户端浏览器是否支持"上一级"呈现。Use the property to determine whether the client's browser supports "uplevel" rendering. 若要支持"上一级"呈现的浏览器，它必须支持 Microsoft Internet Explorer 文档对象模型 (DOM) 版本 4 或更高版本和 ECMAScript 版本 1.2 或更高版本。For a browser to support "uplevel" rendering, it must support Microsoft Internet Explorer Document Object Model (DOM) version 4 or later and ECMAScript version 1.2 or later. > [!NOTE] > 此属性主要由控件开发人员使用。This property is used primarily by control developers.

summary.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether focus is set to the control specified by the property when validation fails.

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether focus is set to the control specified by the property when validation fails.

value.span: 指定的控件上设置焦点时验证失败; 否则为。

span.span: to set focus on the control specified by when validation fails; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定是否自动将焦点设置到指定的控件此验证控件失败时的属性。Use the property to specify whether focus is automatically set to the control specified by the property when this validation control fails. 这允许用户快速更新相应的控件。This allows the user to quickly update the appropriate control. 如果多个验证控件失败，并且此属性设置为`true`，在指定的控件属性的第一个验证控件接收焦点。If multiple validation controls fail and this property is set to `true`, the control specified in the property for the first validation control receives focus. 主题或样式表主题不能设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[ASP.NET 主题和外观](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

summary.span: Gets or sets the text displayed in the validation control when validation fails.

span.span: Gets or sets the text displayed in the validation control when validation fails.

value.span: 验证失败时验证控件中显示的文本。

span.span: The text displayed in the validation control when validation fails.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示尚未设置此属性。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来指定要验证失败时验证控件中显示的文本。Use the property to specify the text to display in a validation control when validation fails. 此外可以显示的所有控件都使用失败的页中的验证摘要控件。You can also display a summary of all controls that fail validation in the page by using a control. 若要指定要在中显示的文本控制，请使用属性。To specify the text to display in a control, use the property. > [!NOTE] > 如果您设置属性但没有设置属性、 的值属性还会显示在验证控件。If you set the property without setting the property, the value of the property is also displayed in the validation control.

summary.span: Performs validation on the associated input control and updates the property.

span.span: Performs validation on the associated input control and updates the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法关联的输入控件执行验证。Use the method to perform validation on the associated input control. 此方法允许您以编程方式对输入控件执行验证。This method allows you to programmatically perform validation on the input control. 属性会自动更新带有验证结果。The property is automatically updated with the validation results. ## Examples 有关的示例方法，用于派生类中，请参阅类概述。For an example of the method used in a derived class, see the class overview.

summary.span: Gets or sets the name of the validation group to which this validation control belongs.

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the validation group to which this validation control belongs.

value.span: 此验证控件所属的验证组的名称。

span.span: The name of the validation group to which this validation control belongs.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示尚未设置此属性。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 提供了许多控件具有回发到服务器的功能。ASP.NET provides many controls that have the ability to post back to the server. 当其中一个控件具有其`CausesValidation`属性设置为`true`，该控件回发到服务器时执行验证。When one of these controls has its `CausesValidation` property set to `true`, validation is performed when the control posts back to server. 以下控件具有回发到服务器的功能：The following controls have the ability to post back to the server: - - - - - - - - - - - - - > [!NOTE] > 其中一些控件回发到服务器时，才`AutoPostBack`属性设置为`true`。Some of these controls post back to the server only when the `AutoPostBack` property is set to `true`. 每个这些控件具有`ValidationGroup`属性，设置时，该控件触发回发到服务器时，验证仅指定组中的验证控件。These controls each have a `ValidationGroup` property that, when set, validates only the validation controls within the specified group when the control triggers a post back to the server. 使用要分配给验证组的验证控件属性。Use the property to assign a validation control to a validation group. 类还公开方法和一个方法，它们接受输入的参数。The class also exposes a method and a method that accept a input parameter. 主题或样式表主题不能设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[ASP.NET 主题和外观](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用要分配给一个组的验证控件属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to assign a validation control to a group. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[BaseValidatorValidationGroup#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BaseValidatorValidationGroup/CS/BaseValidatorValidationGroupcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[BaseValidatorValidationGroup#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BaseValidatorValidationGroup/VB/BaseValidatorValidationGroupvb.aspx#1)]
